- üïπÔ∏è Improve execution UX with more consistent and reliable placement [#606](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/606) ([`@artoftheblue`](https://github.com/artoftheblue), [`@stevejpurves`](https://github.com/stevejpurves), [`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@agoose77`](https://github.com/agoose77))
